{

	"Follow the rules",
};

{

	{
		template = "Epsilon_Security_Group.VR";
		difficulty = "Custom";
	};
};

// LOGGING
timeStampFormat  = "short";
logFile          = "SC\server_console.log";

// SECURITY
BattlEye             = 0;
verifySignatures     = 0;
kickDuplicate        = 1;
allowedFilePatching  = 1;

// FILE EXTENSIONS
allowedLoadFileExtensions[] =       {":"};
allowedPreprocessFileExtensions[] = {"sqf"};
allowedHTMLLoadExtensions[] =       {":"};

// EVENT SCRIPTS
onUserConnected     = "";
onUserDisconnected  = "";
